q1.description:
$G = (\{S\}, \{a,b\}, S, P)$
$S \rightarrow aSb | ab$
Derivation of $aaabbb$:
$S \Rightarrow aSb \Rightarrow aaSbb \Rightarrow aaabbb$
q1.question: What would the language $L(G)$ be?

q2.description:
$G = (\{S\}, \{a,b\}, S, P)$
$S \rightarrow aSb | ab$
Derivation of $aaabbb$:
$S \Rightarrow aSb \Rightarrow aaSbb \Rightarrow aaabbb$
q2.question: Is the language $L(G)$ regular?

q3.description:
$G = (\{S\}, \{a,b\}, S, P)$
$S \rightarrow aSa | bSb | a | b | \lambda$
Derivatino of $ababa$ $S \Rightarrow aSA \Rightarrow abSba \Rightarrow ababa$
$\sum = \{a,b\}$
q3.question: What would the langauge $L(G)$ be?
